Package org.hibernate.sql.exec.spi

Interface JdbcOperation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JdbcAnonBlock, JdbcCall, JdbcMutation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJdbcOperation, JdbcCallImpl, JdbcDelete, JdbcInsert, JdbcSelect, JdbcUpdate, NativeJdbcMutation
    public interface JdbcOperation
    Unifying contract for any SQL statement we want to execute via JDBC.

    • Method Summary
